posts.news_description:
SHSB Bihar ANM Online Form 2020 – Sarkari Naukari – 865 Post, Eligibility, Salary, Admit Card, Exam Date and SHSB Bihar ANM Online Form has released job vacancy for the Recruitment Post of Auxiliary Nurse Midwifery (ANM) On Contract Basis Under National Health Mission For Eligible Diploma Holder In ANM Course.

State Health Society Bihar (SHSB) Is Invited Online Application Form For The Recruitment Post of Auxiliary Nurse Midwifery (ANM) On Contract Basis Under National Health Mission For Eligible Diploma Holder In ANM Course. Interested Candidates Read the Full Notification Before Apply.

SHSB Bihar ANM – Important Dates

 

  • Application Start Date: 09/03/2020 10am
  • Application Last Date: 30/03/2020

SHSB Bihar ANM – Application Fee

 

 

  • Gen/ BC/ MBC/ EWS: Rs…/-
  • SC/ ST/ DQ/ All Female: Rs…/-
  • Pay Fee Via Online Mode

SHSB Bihar ANM – Age Limit

 

  • SSC Selection Post Recruitment 2020 - Post 1355
  • Age As On:01/01/2020
  • Maximum Age: 37 Years
  • (For Age Relaxation See Notification)

SHSB Bihar ANM Total Post : 865

Qualification

 

  • Auxiliary Nurse Midwifery (ANM):- Diploma (2 Years Full Time) In Auxiliary Nurse Midwifery (ANM) Training Course From A Recognized ANM Training Institute.
  • Registration Of Candidates From “Bihar Nurses Registration Council” Shall Also Be Necessary.
